parts.text: Create a simple workflow that triggers on a webhook and sends an email notification
I'll create a simple webhook-triggered email notification workflow for you. This workflow will include a webhook trigger node and an email node to send notifications.
Create a workflow that fetches data from an API, processes it, and stores it in a database

I'll create a data processing workflow that fetches data from an API, transforms it, and stores it in a database. This will include an HTTP Request node, a Set node for data transformation, and a database node for storage.
Create a workflow that runs every hour to check for new files in a folder and process them

I'll create a scheduled workflow that runs every hour to monitor a folder for new files and process them. This will include a Schedule Trigger node, a File System node to check for files, and processing nodes.
